articles.description: ITC, which has business interests in FMCG, hotels, agri and paper sectors, reported another quarter of strong growth across segments. The stock, which is among top gainers in the Nifty pack, gained a little over 2 percent in trade today to hit a day's high of…

articles.author: Mangalam Maloo
articles.title: VIP Industries shares underperform: Managing Directors packing their bags drag its wheels - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Over the course of 2023, while VIP Industries has lost over Rs 100 crore in market capitalisation, Safari Industries has added Rs 4,400 crore to its overall market capitalisation and is now just Rs 1,000 crore less than VIP's market capitalisation.

articles.author: Akash Podishetti
articles.title: SBFC Finance shares list at robust premium of 44% over IPO price - The Economic Times
articles.description: Led by the robust institutional response, the initial public offer (IPO) of SBFC Finance was subscribed by a massive 70.16 times at close. Monday was the last day of bidding for investors.
articles.content: Shares of SBFC Finance listed at a robust premium of 43.8% on the exchanges in Wednesday's trade. The stock debuted at Rs 82 on NSE over the IPO price of Rs 57 apiece. Meanwhile, on BSE it listed at … [+1780 chars]

articles.author: Gurumurthy K & BL Research Bureau
articles.title: Stock to buy today: Bank of India (₹89.69) - BusinessLine
articles.description: Bullish outlook for Bank of India: stock rose 2.8%, broke key resistance of ₹87. Moving average cross-overs strengthen bullish case. Buy on dips at ₹88, target ₹100-105 in 3-4 weeks. Stop-loss at ₹83, trail up to ₹93, then ₹97. Exit at ₹102. Risk of loss.
articles.content: The short-term outlook is bullish for Bank of India. The stock rose 2.8 per cent on Monday, breaking above the key resistance level of 87. The moving average cross-overs on the daily chart also stren… [+666 chars]
